value:
Prince Ced is the heroic inheritor of
the Forseti Tome... Which is why he
can't abandon his mother and Fee!

Silesse was never truly destroyed.
Our forces moved north, to Tófa,
and guard the royal family to this day.

How are you feeling? Make sure to
rest on occasion—it's not healthy to
push yourself too hard!

One day, I'll join the royal guard and
help rebuild Silesse. When that day
comes, we'll drive out the empire.

The prince just...left us. Without a
word. I know he was searching for his
father, but when the queen passed...$k$pHe wasn't even there to mourn...

Wow! This castle is incredible! I
would love to see a castle like this in
Silesse, someday...

Just you wait. One day, I'll be a fully-
fledged pegasus knight! It's always
been my dream!
I've got this!

W-woah, Hermes, calm down! It's OK.
I'm all right, see?

Yes! I'm going to keep getting
stronger. And one day, I'll be strong
enough to defeat the empire!

Hi there! I'm Karin, of Silesse. I may
not be the most seasoned fighter, but
I won't disappoint you!

Do you want to hear my secret?$k$pThe truth is, I...well...$k$pI'm not really a fully-fledged knight
yet! I know, I know. But it's OK. You
see, I really get pegasi.$k$pTake my pegasus, Hermes. He's not
just cute. He's really smart too. And
when I'm angry, he gets angry.$k$pIt's like we share one heart! That's
pretty unique, isn't it? Now it's your
turn. Will you tell me a secret?
えいっ
それーっ！
きゃあっ
もうっ…！
Try me and find out!
You talk too much!
I can deal with this!
I'm no weakling!
I'm sorry, Lady Erinys...
giggle
I am Karin. It's a pleasure.
Wh-what?! An enemy attack?!
Our prince left our country. I've come here in search of him.
Want to meet my pegasus? He's so smart and cute!
I will never forgive Raydrik. Taking innocent girls as hostages!
I...I didn't know. I didn't know so many were starving...
You have my sympathies, so I'll help however I can.
Done!
On your order.
Let me help!
